description: This delicious drink is made with peppermints,&nbsp;vodka, and white&nbsp;chocolate liqueur. It's the perfect recipe for an evening with your friends or family. You can even make these drinks ahead of time and keep them in the refrigerator until you're ready to serve them.
name: Pink Peppermint Martini
recipeIngredient: 3 tbsp. Sugar water (3 tbsp. Sugar mixed with 2 tbsp. water)

recipeInstructions.name: Crush the peppermint candies. Wet the glass rim with the sugar water mixture and dip it into the crushed peppermint candies. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.name: In a cocktail filled with two-thirds of the ice, add the white chocolate liqueur, half-and-half, vanilla vodka, and peppermint extract and shake well until combined and cold.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into the martini glasses and serve immediately.
